arabic_text: فَنَادَىٰهَا مِن تَحۡتِهَآ أَلَّا تَحۡزَنِي قَدۡ جَعَلَ رَبُّكِ تَحۡتَكِ سَرِيّٗا
translation: (24) But he[812] called her from below her, "Do not grieve; your Lord has provided beneath you a stream.
footnotes: [812]- There is a difference of opinion among scholars as to whether "he" refers to the baby or to the angel.
